name: XO Vision 6.2" In-Dash Touchscreen DVD Receiver w/SD Card Slot and USB Input, XOD1751

reviews.name: XO Vision 6.2" In-Dash Touchscreen DVD Receiver w/SD Card Slot and USB Input, XOD1751
reviews.reviewText: To be honest, I read all the reviews from this website and some others. I never thought this was gonna be such a good deal. Im really happy with it. I put it on my Ford 150, I have also a Screen on my roof, Sub, 2 amp, 4 pionner speakers, reverse cam and 2 tweeters, All conected in it. Buy it!
reviews.title: Good Quality

reviews.name: XO Vision 6.2" In-Dash Touchscreen DVD Receiver w/SD Card Slot and USB Input, XOD1751
reviews.reviewText: This is such a handy device, my commute is a lot less tedious and I actually hope I hit traffic sometimes so I can play with it. Set up was a breeze and the touch screen makes it really easy to use. I don't usually go for high tech stuff like this but the price is right and it's definitely worth having if you spend a lot of time in your car. 5 stars!
reviews.title: 30 December 2011

reviews.name: XO Vision 6.2" In-Dash Touchscreen DVD Receiver w/SD Card Slot and USB Input, XOD1751
reviews.reviewText:
I finally got a chance to install this. Wiring was pretty simple and straight forward. If you've every put in a stereo, this part is easy.
I had to trim some of the interior parts of the dash for it to fit since it's bigger than the factory unit. Again no big deal.
It worked great for maybe a half hour. Long enough to get most of the settings where I wanted them and the presets done for the radio.
Then the screen stopped responding to touch and the remote wasn't any use because it never did work.
I love the ability to use other formats other than the radio and CD's so this would've been great for that. By the time I pulled it out and put the factory unit back in, I was ready to start filling it with bullet holes.
I'll be returning this and looking for another brand. One that I know will work. I'll never buy this brand again.
I tried to save money and I got what I paid for.
reviews.title: Junk!

reviews.name: XO Vision 6.2" In-Dash Touchscreen DVD Receiver w/SD Card Slot and USB Input, XOD1751
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy having this in my car. It was really easy to set up and video playback is really nice on a long commute. Having expandable on deck storage is a great addition to the standard external storage options. The touch screen is great and the interface is easy to navigate. The price is right and itâ€™s a high quality product.
reviews.title: 05 January 2012

reviews.name: XO Vision 6.2" In-Dash Touchscreen DVD Receiver w/SD Card Slot and USB Input, XOD1751
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy to use touchscreen to listen DVD music.
reviews.title: It is easy to use
